resources.string: This application is to find data from databases. How to find user data : User should enter full name of database file.("friends.db") Click each name on the list, a toast message will pop up and it will show name,email and phone information. To search other databases, you should restart the application and give that file name on the text box.

This application is to connect databases and receive data and display the data on the phone. Users can search various information about their friends from databases and it will display list of the friends name .
